thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Toyota Recalls Certain Prius And Lexus RX, NV Vehicles

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Toyota Recalls Certain Prius And Lexus RX, NV Vehicles
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Toyota Motor North America:
* TOYOTA RECALLS CERTAIN PRIUS AND LEXUS RX, NX VEHICLES * TOYOTA MOTOR NORTH AMERICA - RECALLS IN U.S. OF ABOUT 49,000 MODEL YEAR 2016 PRIUS, LEXUS RX VEHICLES, MODEL YEAR 2015 – 2016 LEXUS NX VEHICLES‍​
* TOYOTA MOTOR NORTH AMERICA SAYS KNOWN OWNERS OF INVOLVED VEHICLES IN RECALL WILL RECEIVE A NOTIFICATION STARTING IN LATE MARCH 2018
* TOYOTA MOTOR NORTH AMERICA - RECALLED VEHCILES MAY FACE INCIDENTS WHERE AIR BAGS MAY NOT DEPLOY, INCREASING RISK OF INJURY TO OCCUPANTS DURING CRASH Source text: ( toyota.us/2rVUtSo ) Further company coverage:
